title: go.tools works only with tip
body:
by **lk4d4math**: 
For example:
go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/vet
# code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/exact
../../../code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/exact/exact.go:255: new(big.Rat).SetFrac(x.val,
int1).Float32 undefined (type *big.Rat has no fie
ld or method Float32)
../../../code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/exact/exact.go:255: not enough arguments to return
../../../code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/exact/exact.go:257: x.val.Float32 undefined (type
*big.Rat has no field or method Float32)
../../../code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/exact/exact.go:257: not enough arguments to return
